mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_BOARD_CODE, REVIEW_BOARD_NAME FROM BOARD_TYPE ORDER BY REVIEW_BOARD_CODE

SELECT REVIEW_BOARD_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_BOARD_WRITE_DATE, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_EMAIL FROM "REVIEW_BOARD" R JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND REVIEW_BOARD_CODE = #{reviewBoardCode} ORDER BY REVIEW_BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_BOARD WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND REVIEW_BOARD_CODE = #{reviewBoardCode}
AND REVIEW_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND REVIEW_BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND ( REVIEW_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR REVIEW_BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' )

SELECT REVIEW_BOARD_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_BOARD_WRITE_DATE, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_EMAIL FROM "REVIEW_BOARD" R JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND REVIEW_BOARD_CODE = #{reviewBoardCode}
AND REVIEW_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND REVIEW_BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND ( REVIEW_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR REVIEW_BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' )
ORDER BY REVIEW_BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT REVIEW_BOARD_NO , REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_BOARD_CONTENT, REVIEW_BOARD_CODE, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, REVIEW_BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR( REVIEW_BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS' ) REVIEW_BOARD_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR( REVIEW_BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS' ) REVIEW_BOARD_UPDATE_DATE FROM REVIEW_BOARD JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND REVIEW_BOARD_CODE = #{reviewBoardCode} AND REVIEW_BOARD_NO = #{reviewBoardNo}
